00028 #define MagickImageCoderSignature  ((unsigned long) \
00029   (((MagickLibVersion) << 8) | MAGICKCORE_QUANTUM_DEPTH))

00031   (((MagickLibVersion) << 8) | MAGICKCORE_QUANTUM_DEPTH))
